item.title: Boo to spooky chocolate prices! It's the year of chewy, fruity Halloween treats

item.title: The Wider Costs of the N.B.A. Insider-Trading Scandal
item.description: Criminal charges over a wide-ranging betting ring have called into question the sports world’s embrace of legalized gambling.
